faq_q1: How do I reset my password?
faq_a1: You can reset your password by clicking the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page and following the instructions sent to your email.
faq_q2: How do I update my profile?
faq_a2: For Graduates, navigate to the 'Profile' page in your dashboard. For Companies and Schools, you can update your public information from the 'Company Profile' or 'School Profile' page respectively.
faq_q3: How does the AI resume parser work?
faq_a3: Simply upload your resume on the Profile page, and our AI will automatically extract key information like your work experience, education, and skills to pre-fill your profile fields, saving you time.
faq_q4: Can I post jobs as a company?
faq_a4: Yes! On the 'Company Profile' page, you can manage your existing job postings and add new ones. These jobs will then be visible to all graduates on the platform.
faq_a5: Our system analyzes your skills, experience, and education listed in your profile and matches them against active job listings to provide you with the most relevant opportunities.
